disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 29 April to end of Friday 29 April GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Cloudy and overcast conditions are forecast for Friday.<br/><br/>A continuing cool and relatively 'clean' low altitude airflow from the North Sea. A light north-easterly breeze should aid dispersion of any local emissions.<br/>     <br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Saturday 30 April to end of Saturday 30 April GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: The settled but largely cloudy conditions of recent days are forecast to continue on Saturday.<br/><br/>A light north-easterly breeze should give fair dispersion of local emissions while bearing little by way of imported pollution.<br/>     <br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
